CadSettings.callsignTemplateInfo: Это шаблон позывного юнита. Можно использовать следующие переменные: {variables}
CadSettings.caseNumberTemplateInfo: Это шаблон номера дела. Можно использовать следующие переменные: {variables}
CadSettings.pairedUnitTemplateInfo: Это шаблон парного юнита. Можно использовать следующие переменные: {variables}

DiscordRolesTab.discordRolesInfo: Когда пользователь CAD проходит аутентификацию через Discord, соответствующие разрешения CAD будут предоставлены этому пользователю из его ролей в Discord.
DiscordRolesTab.adminRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права администратора в CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.leoRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права LEO в CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.leoSupervisorRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права супервайзера LEO в CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.emsFdRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права EMS/FD в CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.dispatchRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права диспетчера в CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.towRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права эвакуатора в CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.taxiRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права такси в CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.courthouseRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права судьи в CAD.
DiscordRolesTab.whitelistedRoleInfo: Роль Discord, которая будет устанавливать права "белого" списка

DiscordWebhooksTab.discordWebhooksInfo: Выберите канал для каждого типа вебхука. Это создаст новый вебхук Discord и отправит сообщение для соответствующего типа события.
DiscordWebhooksTab.calls911ChannelInfo: Канал Discord, куда будут отправлены вызовы 911.
DiscordWebhooksTab.statusUpdatesChannelInfo: Канал Discord, куда будут отправлены события обновления статуса.
DiscordWebhooksTab.panicButtonChannelInfo: Канал Discord, куда будут отправлены события нажатия кнопки паники.
DiscordWebhooksTab.bolosChannelInfo: Канал Discord, куда будут отправлены новые BOLO.
DiscordWebhooksTab.impoundedVehicleChannelInfo: Канал Discord, куда будут отправлены уведомления об эвакуации транспорта.
DiscordWebhooksTab.citizenRecordsChannelInfo: Канал Discord, куда будут отправлены записи о новых отчетах об аресте, штрафах, ордерах и письменных предупреждениях.
DiscordWebhooksTab.warrantsChannelInfo: Канал Discord, куда будут отправлены записи о новых ордерах.

ApiTokenTab.tokenDescription: Este é o token usado para se comunicar com a API. Este token é único e não deve ser compartilhado com ninguém. Leia mais
ApiTokenTab.discordBotCommand: Comando de integração de bot do Discord
ApiTokenTab.discordBotCommandDescription: Este comando pode ser usado com a integração do bot do Discord.
ApiTokenTab.readMorePublicAPI: Leia mais sobre a API Pública aqui.

Features.TOW-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create tow calls
Features.TAXI-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create taxi calls
Features.TRUCK_LOGS-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create truck logs.
Features.LICENSE_EXAMS-description: When enabled, this will require citizens to pass a license exam before they can obtain a license.
Features.AOP-description: When disabled, this will hide the AOP from the CAD.
Features.BUSINESS-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create and join businesses.
Features.ALLOW_DUPLICATE_CITIZEN_NAMES-descriptio: When enabled, this will allow users to create citizens with the same name (name and surname)
Features.BLEETER-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create bleets.
Features.COURTHOUSE-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to create expungement requests, name change requests. Users with the required permissions can create court entries and posts.
Features.WEAPON_REGISTRATION-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to register weapons.
Features.CALLS_911-description: When enabled, this will allow the user of 911 calls in the CAD.
Features.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBERS-description: When enabled, this will allow citizens to use Social Security Numbers.
Features.CUSTOM_TEXTFIELD_VALUES-description: When enabled, this will allow users to enter custom vehicle/weapon values when registering a vehicle/weapon
Features.ACTIVE_DISPATCHERS-description: When enabled, certain buttons on the LEO and EMS/FD dashboard will become disabled when there is an active dispatcher.
Features.ALLOW_CITIZEN_UPDATE_LICENSE: Allow citizens to update their licenses
Features.ALLOW_CITIZEN_UPDATE_LICENSE-description: When disabled, this will only allow officers to manage licenses for citizens.
Features.ALLOW_REGULAR_LOGIN-description: When disabled, this will only allow users to login with Discord/Steam.
Features.ACTIVE_INCIDENTS-description: When enabled, this will allow Dispatch to create active incidents.
Features.RADIO_CHANNEL_MANAGEMENT-description: When enabled, This will allow dispatch to manage the radio channel a unit is in. This can then be used to enhance the experience via the CAD's Public API.
Features.ALLOW_CITIZEN_DELETION_BY_NON_ADMIN: Allow citizens to delete their own citizen
Features.ALLOW_CITIZEN_DELETION_BY_NON_ADMIN-desc: When enabled, this will allow citizens to delete their own citizen.
Features.DMV-description: When enabled, vehicles must first be approved by the Department of Motor Vehicles within the CAD.
Features.BADGE_NUMBERS-description: When enabled, this will allow officers to use badge numbers.
Features.USER_API_TOKENS-description: When enabled, this will allow users to generate their own API token to perform actions with via their account.
Features.CITIZEN_RECORD_APPROVAL-description: When enabled, this will require supervisors to accept or decline arrest reports before they can be used.
Features.COMMON_CITIZEN_CARDS-description: When enabled, this will allow any officers to edit, register vehicles/weapons to, create medical records to any citizen.
Features.CREATE_USER_CITIZEN_LEO-description: When enabled, this will allow officers to create citizens and vehicles that don't exist yet when searching for them. This citizen/vehicle will not be connected to any user.
Features.LEO_TICKETS-description: When enabled, this will allow officers to create tickets.
Features.LEO_BAIL-description: When enabled, this will allow officers to add bails to arrest reports.
Features.COURTHOUSE_POSTS-description: When enabled, this will allow users with the correct permissions to create posts in the courthouse. These posts will be visible to anyone.
Features.ACTIVE_WARRANTS-description: When enabled, this will display active warrants on the LEO Dashboard.
Features.WARRANT_STATUS_APPROVAL-description: When enabled, this will require supervisors to approve 'active' warrants.
Features.CITIZEN_DELETE_ON_DEAD: Delete citizen when marked as dead
Features.CITIZEN_DELETE_ON_DEAD-description: When enabled, this will delete the citizen when the citizen is marked as dead.
Features.PANIC_BUTTON-description: When enabled, this will allow LEO and EMS-FD to press a panic button.
Features.DIVISIONS-description: When enabled, this will require officers and EMS-FD deputies to provide their division(s).
Features.TONES-description: When enabled, this will allow Dispatch to create temporary messages for LEO and EMS/FD.
Features.CITIZEN_CREATION_RECORDS-description: When enabled, this allow citizens to add charges and flags to their citizen.
Features.BUREAU_OF_FIREARMS-description: When enabled, weapons must first be approved by the Bureau of Firearms within the CAD.
Features.CALL_911_APPROVAL-description: When a citizen creates a 911 call and there are active dispatchers, this will require dispatch to approve the call before active units can view the call.
Features.DISCORD_AUTH-description: When enabled, this will allow users to authenticate with Discord.
Features.STEAM_OAUTH-description: When enabled, this will allow users to authenticate with Steam.
Features.FORCE_DISCORD_AUTH-description: When enabled, this will force users to sync with Discord after registration.
Features.FORCE_STEAM_AUTH-description: When enabled, this will force users to sync with Steam after registration.
